title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported
descriptions:
**Unleash Your Gaming Potential with the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard**

Take your gaming experience to the next level with the Redragon K617 Fizz, a compact and powerful wired RGB gaming keyboard designed specifically for FPS gamers. With its 61-key layout and Linear Red switches, this keyboard provides unparalleled accuracy and speed.

**Experience Unmatched Performance**

The Redragon K617 Fizz features hot-swappable linear red switches, which offer a quiet and smooth typing experience with a lifespan of 50 million keypresses. The compact design allows for efficient workspace management, giving you more room to focus on your game.

**Customize Your Experience**

The keyboard's RGB lighting system offers 20 customizable presets, adjustable brightness, and speed. You can also adjust the flow speed to suit your gaming style. With our pro driver software, you can customize key bindings, macros, and shortcuts to fit your unique needs.

**Built for FPS Gamers**

Designed specifically for First-Person Shooter (FPS) gamers, this keyboard is optimized for mouse movement and keyboard commands. The compact design allows for faster movement and improved accuracy, giving you a competitive edge in the game.

**Additional Features**

* Compact design with 61-key layout
* Linear Red switches for quiet and smooth typing experience
* Hot-swappable switches for easy customization
* RGB lighting system with 20 customizable presets and adjustable brightness and speed
* Pro driver software with customizable key bindings, macros, and shortcuts

**Upgrade Your Gaming Experience Today**

Don't miss out on this opportunity to take your gaming skills to the next level. Order the Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard today and experience the difference for yourself.

**Order Now and Get:**

* A free carrying case
* A lifetime warranty
* Dedicated customer support
